title: As a user, I want to reset my password via email
description: Users who forget their passwords need a way to securely request a reset link and set a new password. The system should send an email with a secure token, and provide an endpoint to submit a new password using that token.
acceptance_criteria: User can submit their email to request a reset link.
System generates a secure, time-limited token for the reset link.
System sends an email containing the reset link (or logs it if email service is mocked).
User can submit a new password along with the valid token to update their credentials.
Token is invalidated after successful use or expiration.
